rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area with Mediterranean-style arches and tiled flooring. It serves as the initial living area leading to other sections of the cottage.

rooms.name: Dining & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: Integrated kitchenette and dining space with local Vastu-aligned east-facing window for morning light. Mediterranean-inspired open shelving and warm color accents.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Studio
rooms.description: Large studio area that can be configured as a workspace, guest room, or relaxation zone. Designed with flexible partitions to maintain open space concept typical in triplex studios.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym equipped for essential workout equipment and natural ventilation. The layout respects local building norms regarding structural support and safety.

rooms.name: Bathroom & Utility Area
rooms.description: Compact but functional bathroom with Vastu guidelines ensuring placement away from main living areas, along with storage space for utilities.

openings.details: A Mediterranean-style door with arches and decorative moldings.
